General.Name: Ireka Corporation Bhd
General.Description: Ireka Corporation Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the construction, real estate, technologies, and urban transportation business in Malaysia and Vietnam. The company operates through Construction, Property Development, Trading and Services, and Property Investment segments. It undertakes structural and building construction works; and civil engineering works, including earthworks, roads, bridges and interchanges, runways, public utilities, golf courses, drainage works, and tin mining works. The company is also involved in the investment, development, management, and rental of properties; provision of other related professional and consultancy services; import, distribution, and trading of computer hardware; computer programming, consultancy, and computer system management activities; and rental of construction plant and machinery. In addition, it offers venture capital funds to the internet, e-commerce, and related technology-based companies, as well as system integration and software solutions. Further, the company provides, supplies, and installs high voltage power, low voltage power, structured cabling, and extra low voltage systems. Ireka Corporation Berhad was founded in 1967 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
